      • addCourseNotesReference

                            int commentId,
                            CourseNotesReference courseNotesRef,
                            int userId)
                     throws ClassicDatabaseException,
                            ClassicNotFoundException,
                            ClassicUnauthorizedException
        add a course notes reference
        Parameters:
        courseNotesId - id of the courseNotes the Comment refers to
        commentId - the id of the Comment
        courseNotesRef - reference to add
        Returns:
        id of the reference
        Throws:
        ClassicDatabaseException
        ClassicNotFoundException
        ClassicUnauthorizedException

        commentId - id of the comment
